sentences.sContent: The seventeenth to Hezir, the eighteenth to Aphses.
sentences.sContent_eng: The seventeenth to Hezir, the eighteenth to Aphses.
sentences.sCn: 第十七是希悉，第十八是哈辟悉。

sentences.sContent: Third was the development of an international state system in Europe in the seventeenth century and its spread and adoption by nations on every continent.
sentences.sContent_eng: Third was the development of an international state system in Europe in the seventeenth century and its spread and adoption by nations on every continent.
sentences.sCn: 再次就是公元十七世纪欧洲各国国家体制的变化发展以及它的广泛传播并被各大洲的国家所借鉴。

words.tran: 十七岁的；十七的，十七个的
第七十的；七十分之一的
